text: The Meitar Open is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor hard courts. The event is classified as a $60,000 ITF Women's Circuit tournament and has been held in Meitar, Israel, since 2019. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Clara Tauson || Katharina Hobgarski || 4–6, 6–3, 6–1 |} === Doubles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Sofya Lansere Kamilla Rakhimova || Anastasia Gasanova Valeriya Strakhova || 4–6, 6–4, [10–3] |} == External links == * ITF search Category:ITF Women's Circuit Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019 Category:Hard court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Israel Category:2019 establishments in Israel
title: Meitar Open
